songs.title: Irony*
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Admire me and inspire me
I do the same thing for you, that's the irony
All these arguments are starting to get trifling
Tear drops, we smoke, we gon' need some Visine

[Verse 1]
Uh, lemme hit it, hit it
I remember the first time you let me hit it, hit it
I remember the first time we was kissin', kissin'
If you leave I miss it
Baby, let's be realistic and a little optimistic
Tell me that you dying with me
And that you ridin' with me
You know I ride with semi's
I'll give a fuck nigga plenty
Really, really, really, really
Flexin' and fuckin'
That shit be silly
Know I ride you like a wheely
Uh, really, really, really, really
Tell me are you fuckin' with me
Or are you just fuckin' kidding
Fuck ups, yeah I had too many
Still deserve a happy ending
All those drugs that I was taking
Almost had an early ending
All that shit that he was talking
Almost had an early ending
Back on point
Kiss my neck while I roll this joint
Moan real loud, let me hear your voice
Together forever won't have no choice
But I wouldn't trust me with your soul
That shit fuck around and get sold
I went platinum without trying
Niggas be bustin' they ass for gold

[Chorus]
Admire me and inspire me
I do the same thing for you, that's the irony
All these arguments are starting to get trifling
Tear drops, we smoke, we gon' need some Visine
